import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './pizza.css' export default function Pizza({ pizza }) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [varient, setVarient] = useState('small'); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleAddToCart = () => { dispatch(addtocart({ pizza, quantity, varient })); handleClose(); }; return (

{pizza.name}

Variants

Quantity

Price: {pizza.prices[0][varient] * quantity} Rs/-

{pizza.name}

{pizza.description}
); }
